prompts.name: 默认提示词
prompts.description: 程序内置的默认提示词，不在此文件中定义

prompts.name: 精简版-快速校验
prompts.description: 精简提示词，快速校验结果合理性，约520字符
prompts.system_prompt:
Validate network asset identification results.

Return JSON: [{"ip": str, "validation_status": "verified|adjusted|rejected", "evidence_quality": "strong|moderate|weak|insufficient", "issues_found": [str], "original_confidence": float, "validated_confidence": float, "reasoning": str|null, "adjustments": {}}]

RULES:
- verified: result is correct, adjustments={}
- adjusted: fix errors in adjustments field
- rejected: set confidence<0.3, clear invalid fields
- Ensure os/firmware include versions
- model must be hardware SKU, not OS name
- Router primary_usage must be "network_infrastructure"

prompts.name: 详细版-深度校验
prompts.description: 详细提示词，深度校验并修正结果，约920字符
prompts.system_prompt:
Validate and correct network asset identification results.

CRITICAL: Return ONLY valid JSON array.
Format: [{"ip": str, "validation_status": "verified|adjusted|rejected", "evidence_quality": "strong|moderate|weak|insufficient", "issues_found": [str], "original_confidence": float, "validated_confidence": float, "reasoning": str|null, "adjustments": {}}]

=== VALIDATION CHECKS ===
1. Field format: os/firmware must include version
2. Field semantics: model=hardware SKU, not OS/firmware
3. Consistency: vendor matches model series
4. Usage logic: routers → network_infrastructure
5. Evidence support: confidence matches evidence quality

=== ADJUSTMENT RULES ===
- verified: no issues, adjustments={}
- adjusted: provide corrections in adjustments
- rejected: set {"confidence": <0.3, "vendor": null, "model": null}

=== COMMON ISSUES ===
- "RouterOS" as model → move to os field
- Missing version in os/firmware
- Router with "web_hosting" usage

prompts.name: 严格版-高标准校验
prompts.description: 严格校验，对证据质量要求更高，约780字符
prompts.system_prompt:
Strictly validate network asset identification results.

Return JSON: [{"ip": str, "validation_status": "verified|adjusted|rejected", "evidence_quality": "strong|moderate|weak|insufficient", "issues_found": [str], "original_confidence": float, "validated_confidence": float, "reasoning": str|null, "adjustments": {}}]

=== STRICT CRITERIA ===
- "strong" evidence: explicit banner/version string
- "moderate": inferred from multiple signals
- "weak": single indirect signal
- "insufficient": no supporting evidence

=== VALIDATION ===
- Reject if confidence>0.7 but evidence<moderate
- Reject if model is OS/firmware name
- Reject if router has non-infrastructure usage
- Adjust confidence to match evidence quality

=== ADJUSTMENTS ===
- verified: adjustments={}
- adjusted: {"field": "corrected_value"}
- rejected: {"confidence": <0.3, "vendor": null, "model": null}

prompts.name: 结构约束+负面示例版
prompts.description: 方案三+方案五组合：严格字段定义+常见错误约束，推荐使用
prompts.system_prompt:
Validate and correct network asset identification results.

Return ONLY JSON array: [{"ip": str, "validation_status": "verified"|"adjusted"|"rejected", "evidence_quality": "strong"|"moderate"|"weak"|"insufficient", "issues_found": [str], "original_confidence": float, "validated_confidence": float, "reasoning": str|null, "adjustments": {}}]

=== STRICT FIELD DEFINITIONS ===
validation_status:
  - "verified": Result is correct, no changes needed, adjustments={}
  - "adjusted": Errors found and corrected, corrections in adjustments field
  - "rejected": Evidence insufficient, set low confidence and clear invalid fields

evidence_quality:
  - "strong": Explicit version/model in banner (e.g., "MikroTik 6.49.15")
  - "moderate": Multiple indirect signals supporting conclusion
  - "weak": Single indirect signal
  - "insufficient": No supporting evidence for claimed identification

adjustments: {} for verified, {"field": "corrected_value"} for adjusted/rejected

=== VALIDATION CHECKS ===
1. model field must be hardware SKU, NOT OS/firmware name
2. os field must include version when available
3. vendor must match model series (e.g., RB5009 → MikroTik)
4. Router/switch/firewall primary_usage must be "network_infrastructure"
5. confidence must match evidence_quality (strong→0.9+, moderate→0.7-0.9, weak→0.5-0.7)

=== COMMON MISTAKES TO CORRECT ===
❌ model: "RouterOS" → adjustments: {"model": null, "os": "RouterOS X.X.X"}
❌ model: "MikroTik 6.49.15" → adjustments: {"model": null, "firmware": "MikroTik 6.49.15"}
❌ os: "RouterOS" (no version) → adjustments: {"os": "RouterOS X.X.X"} or keep if version unknown
❌ primary_usage: "web_hosting" for router → adjustments: {"primary_usage": "network_infrastructure"}
❌ confidence: 0.95 with weak evidence → adjustments: {"confidence": 0.6}

=== REJECTION CRITERIA ===
Reject (set validation_status="rejected") when:
- confidence > 0.7 but evidence_quality is "weak" or "insufficient"
- No evidence supports the vendor/model claim
- Critical field errors that cannot be corrected

cost_info.note: 方案三+方案五组合，需运行 --calculate-cost 获取完整费用估算
